price: "Yã Ubangijina! Lalle ne sũ, sun ɓatar da mãsu yawa daga mutãne sa'an nan wanda ya bĩ ni, to, lalle shi, yanã daga gare ni, kuma wanda ya sãɓa mini, to, lalle ne Kai Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: رَبِّ إِنَّهُنَّ أَضۡلَلۡنَ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِۖ فَمَن تَبِعَنِي فَإِنَّهُۥ مِنِّيۖ وَمَنۡ عَصَانِي فَإِنَّكَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbi innahunna aḍlalna kathīran mina al-nāsi faman tabiʿanī fa-innahu minnī waman ʿaṣānī fa-innaka ghafūrun raḥīmun
